## CSS

```css
#container {
  background: #f5d713;
  height: 100%;
  width: 100%;
  position: relative;
  overflow: hidden;
}
svg {
  position: absolute;
  top: 3%;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
}
[id^="wave-end"] {
  visibility: hidden;
}
```
## Javascript

```javascript
MorphSVGPlugin.convertToPath("circle");

var tl = new TimelineLite(),
    circles = document.querySelectorAll('.circle'),
    startLines = document.querySelectorAll('[id^="wave-start"]'),
    endLines = document.querySelectorAll('[id^="wave-end"]'),
    bgs = document.querySelectorAll('[id^="bg-end"]');

tl.staggerFrom(circles, .6, {scale: 0, transformOrigin: "50% 50%", ease: Bounce.easeOut}, .3)
  .staggerTo(circles, .3, {scale: 0, transformOrigin: "50% 50%"})
  .staggerFrom(startLines, 1, {scaleX: 0, transformOrigin: "50% 50%"}, "0", "-=.2")
.to(startLines[0], 1, {morphSVG:endLines[0]})
.to(startLines[1], 1, {morphSVG:endLines[1]}, "-=1")
.to(startLines[2], 1, {morphSVG:endLines[2]}, "-=1")
.from(bgs, .5, {opacity: "0"});
```

}

    background-size: contain;
    width: 100%;
}

  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
}

}

}

## Javascript

```javascript
var contours = document.querySelectorAll('#contour svg path'),
    body = document.getElementById('body'),
    canvas = document.querySelector('#contour canvas'),
    mouth = document.getElementById('smile'),
    tl = new TimelineLite();

(function bootstrap() {
  tl.paused(true);
  tl.staggerFrom(contours, 3, {drawSVG: "0%"}, .3)
  .from(canvas, .3, {opacity: 0}, "-=1")
  .from(mouth, .3, {opacity: 0}, "-=1")
  .staggerTo(contours, .5, {opacity: 0}, "-=.2")
  .to("#mouth-end-contour-copy", 1, {morphSVG: "#mouth-end-contour", ease: Power1.easeOut}, "+=1")
    .to("#mouth-closed-contour", .3, {opacity: 0}, "-=1.5")
    .to("#mouth-closed-nasolabial-left", .7, {morphSVG: "#mouth-end-nasolabial-left", ease:  Power1.easeOut}, "-=1.5")
    .to("#mouth-closed-nasolabial-right", .7, {morphSVG: "#mouth-end-nasolabial-right", ease:  Power1.easeOut}, "-=1.5")
    .to('#mouth-closed', 0, {opacity: 0}, "-=1.2")
    .to('#mouth-end', 0, {opacity: 1}, "-=1.2"); 
  body.style.opacity = "1";
})();

function animate () {
  return tl.play();
}

animate();
```

## CSS

```css
#body {
  height: 100vh;
  width: 83.4319527vh; // to keep the proportions of the body for accurate positioning of the mouth
  position: relative;
}
#contour canvas {
    display: block;
    background-image: url('http://performance.frontend.training/speaking.png');
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    background-size: contain;
    width: 100%;
  position:relative;
  z-index: 1;
}
#contour svg {
  position: absolute;
  z-index: 0;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
}
```
## Javascript

```javascript
var contours = document.querySelectorAll('#contour svg path'),
    body = document.getElementById('body'),
    canvas = document.querySelector('#contour canvas'),
    tl = new TimelineLite();

(function bootstrap() {
  tl.paused(true);
  tl.staggerFrom(contours, 3, {drawSVG: "0%"}, 0.3)
    .from(canvas, .3, {opacity: 0}, "-=1")
    .staggerTo(contours, .2, {opacity: 0});
  body.style.opacity = "1";
})();

function animate () {
  return tl.play();
}
animate();
```
